modName: Striped Underwear retex for CBBE 2 Nevernude
summary: This is a simple Retex based on the underwear from cotyounoyume\'s sexy apparel replacer for CBBE http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5564
descriptionHtml:
Requirement:
Calientes Female Body Mod BBE v0_2
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Main files include default White underwear from cotyounoyume\'s mod. Copy files to appropriate Skyrim Directory and then choose a color. Rewrite over the Default file with the file from the color of your choice and enjoy. 

*Update - Added the Meshes for the Topless version. Just copy the new meshes over the ones from the main file.

Note: I only created a handful of colors using Photoshop\'s blending properties. There is no limit to the designs and colors that could be created. If there is enough interest I will post the PSD files for all to edit to their liking.

*also this is my first attempt at posting a mod so let me know if I need to do anything different.

Credit:
Thanks to
cotyounoyume - a little sexy apparel replacer
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5564
Caliente - Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
XunAmarox (Jen and 2pac4eva7) - Blender NIF Import - Export Tutorial
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3790
author: esmm40
